content: Is there a right approach for adding a search parameter for an extension that applies to many resource types? Say there's a new identifier field added on everything. Do I need to create a separate SearchParameter resource for each resource type that makes use of the identifier extension? Or is there a way to make the FHIRPath expression on one search parameter for everything? It looks like the HAPI server does the former? But if that's the case, then why are SearchParameter.base and SearchParameter.target lists?
http://build.fhir.org/searchparameter.html#srch has some details, and there are examples of how a search parameter can work across resources. (Will grab one...)

The example I want is called http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/clinical-patient -- and it's available in http://build.fhir.org/hl7.fhir.r5.core.tgz but I'm having trouble figuring out where it's hosted online.
Thanks. I'll play with that a bit.
